attributes.action: York Council Leader to be removed from office
attributes.additional_details:
I the undersigned request that the elected goverment of the UK and its relevant minister remove the Leader of York Council from office.

This is not a party political issue merly one of competence for the role.

He has repeatedly failed to deliver on pre-election promises and has repeatedly been in so called charge on numerous York Council failures and money wasting vanity ventures that deliver no benefits to the people of York.

The council leader has led a delibrate policy for York council taking on further unnecessary debt and finacial mis-management to further their future political careers without any recourse for their legacy of this said debt.

This result of this appalling mis-management will be higher above inflation council tax demands for years 2013 for the people of York again.

The council tax paying electorate of York deserve better public service for their tax contributions than they recieve at present.
